title: Tower of Evil v1.0 [PD]
description:
This is a 3D survivor horror adventure game. You are held captive in a prison called Tower of Evil. 

Your goal is to survive and escape. In order to do that, you will have to go through many dangerous situations, face demonic creatures, solve puzzles, riddles and much more!

Features:

- Stunning detailed 3D Graphics optimized for mobiles!
- Puzzles using 3D physics!
- Easy and Intuitive UI and Game Controls - Just touch or drag the objects!
- 20+ Levels filled with monsters, items, puzzles and challenges!
- Chapter based game. (5 levels per chapter).
- Free Content Updates!

Become a survivor today!

More info:
